# Geographic Denisty of Homes

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(mapview)
library(sf)

house_df <- house_data
subsample_df <- house_df[sample(nrow(house_df), 500), ]

#mapview(subsample_df, xcol = "long", ycol = "lat", crs = 4269)
```


# Linear model's

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
lr_model_rooms <- lm(price ~ bedrooms + bathrooms, data = house_df)
summary(lr_model_rooms)
```

```{r}
lr_model_rooms <- lm(price ~ sqft_living + sqft_lot, data = house_df)
summary(lr_model_rooms)
```
